original_title: The Adventures of Uncle Colt and Cletus: Hedge-Hoggin
overview: The story of a couple of rednecks who have moved to Los Angeles to become Rock-Stars. Hedge-hoggin', the first film in what is to become an ongoing saga, we find our heroes taking a much expected break from work to drink some frosty brews, when suddenly they come upon a genie. They're granted one wish, the only catch being, are these boys smart enough to wish for what they want, or are they gonna' get what they deserve? Featuring special guest appearances from Ron "the Hedgehog" Jeremy and Vern Troyer; Hedge-Hoggin' is fun ride filled with fast cars, faster women, and a couple of slow witted good'ol boys who are always on the look-out for a good time.
tagline: Bad as Hell. Dumb as Dirt
title: The Adventures of Uncle Colt and Cletus: Hedge-Hoggin
